00092 // Legacy: define fixed maximum number of channels for platforms that don't support 7.1 (and above).
00093 #if defined(AK_71AUDIO)
00094 #define AK_STANDARD_MAX_NUM_CHANNELS            (8)                         ///< Platform supports at least 7.1
00095 #elif defined(AK_LFECENTER) && defined(AK_REARCHANNELS)
00096 #define AK_VOICE_MAX_NUM_CHANNELS               (6)                         ///< Platform supports up to 5.1 configuration.
00097 #define AK_STANDARD_MAX_NUM_CHANNELS            (AK_VOICE_MAX_NUM_CHANNELS) ///< Platform supports 5.1
00098 #elif defined(AK_REARCHANNELS)
00099     #ifdef AK_WII
00100         #define AK_VOICE_MAX_NUM_CHANNELS       (2)                         ///< Platform supports up to stereo configuration.
00101     #else
00102         #define AK_VOICE_MAX_NUM_CHANNELS       (4)                         ///< Platform supports up to 4.0 configuration.
00103     #endif
00104 #else 
00105 #define AK_VOICE_MAX_NUM_CHANNELS               (2)                         ///< Platform supports up to stereo configuration.
00106 #define AK_STANDARD_MAX_NUM_CHANNELS            (AK_VOICE_MAX_NUM_CHANNELS) ///< Platform supports stereo.
00107 #endif

00308 class AkEmitterListenerPair : public AkSphericalCoord
00309 {
00310 public:
00312     AkEmitterListenerPair() 
00313         : fEmitterAngle( 0 )
00314         , m_uListenerMask( 0 )
00315     {
00316         r = 0;
00317         theta = 0;
00318         phi = 0;
00319     }
00321     ~AkEmitterListenerPair() {}
00322 
00324     inline AkReal32 Distance() const { return r; }
00325 
00327     inline AkReal32 Azimuth() const { return theta; }
00328 
00330     inline AkReal32 Elevation() const { return phi; }
00331 
00334     inline AkReal32 EmitterAngle() const { return fEmitterAngle; }
00335 
00337     inline AkUInt32 ListenerMask() const { return m_uListenerMask; }
00338     
00339     // Get listener index of first listener assigned to this emitter-listener pair. 
00341     inline AkUInt8 ListenerIdx() const 
00342     { 
00343         AkUInt8 uListenerIdx = 0;
00344         AkUInt8 uListenerMask = m_uListenerMask;
00345         while ( !( uListenerMask & 0x01 ) )
00346         {
00347             uListenerMask >>= 1;
00348             ++uListenerIdx;
00349         }
00350         return uListenerIdx; 
00351     }
00352     
00353 public:
00354     AkReal32 fEmitterAngle;     
00355 
00356 protected:
00357     AkUInt8 m_uListenerMask;    // Listener mask (in the 3D case, only one bit should be set).
00358 };
00359

00368     AkReal32            fScalingFactor;

00373 enum AkCurveInterpolation
00374 {
00375 //DONT GO BEYOND 15! (see below for details)
00376 //Curves from 0 to LastFadeCurve NEED TO BE A MIRROR IMAGE AROUND LINEAR (eg. Log3 is the inverse of Exp3)
00377     AkCurveInterpolation_Log3           = 0, 
00378     AkCurveInterpolation_Sine           = 1, 
00379     AkCurveInterpolation_Log1           = 2, 
00380     AkCurveInterpolation_InvSCurve      = 3, 
00381     AkCurveInterpolation_Linear         = 4, 
00382     AkCurveInterpolation_SCurve         = 5, 
00383     AkCurveInterpolation_Exp1           = 6, 
00384     AkCurveInterpolation_SineRecip      = 7, 
00385     AkCurveInterpolation_Exp3           = 8, 
00386     AkCurveInterpolation_LastFadeCurve  = 8, 
00387     AkCurveInterpolation_Constant       = 9  
00388 //DONT GO BEYOND 15! The value is stored on 5 bits,
00389 //but we can use only 4 bits for the actual values, keeping
00390 //the 5th bit at 0 to void problems when the value is
00391 //expanded to 32 bits.
00392 };
00393 #define AKCURVEINTERPOLATION_NUM_STORAGE_BIT 5 ///< Internal storage restriction, for internal use only.
00394 
00395 #ifndef AK_MAX_AUX_PER_OBJ
00396     #define AK_MAX_AUX_PER_OBJ          (4) ///< Maximum number of environments in which a single game object may be located at a given time.
00397 
00398     // This define is there to Limit the number of Aux per sound that can be processed.
00399     // This value must be >= AK_MAX_AUX_PER_OBJ and >= AK_NUM_AUX_SEND_PER_OBJ (4)
00400     #define AK_MAX_AUX_SUPPORTED                    (AK_MAX_AUX_PER_OBJ + 4)
00401 #else
00402     // This define is there to Limit the number of Aux per sound that can be processed.
00403     // This value must be >= AK_MAX_AUX_PER_OBJ and >= AK_MAX_AUX_PER_NODE
00404     #define AK_MAX_AUX_SUPPORTED                    AK_MAX_AUX_PER_OBJ
00405 
00406 #endif
00407

00480 // ---------------------------------------------------------------
00481 // File Type ID Definitions
00482 // ---------------------------------------------------------------
00483 
00484 // These correspond to IDs specified in the conversion plug-ins' XML
00485 // files. Audio sources persist them to "remember" their format.
00486 // DO NOT CHANGE THEM without talking to someone in charge of persistence!
00487 
00488 // Vendor ID.
00489 #define AKCOMPANYID_AUDIOKINETIC        (0)     ///< Audiokinetic inc.
00490 #define AKCOMPANYID_AUDIOKINETIC_EXTERNAL (1)   ///< Audiokinetic inc.
00491 #define AKCOMPANYID_MCDSP               (256)   ///< McDSP
00492 #define AKCOMPANYID_WAVEARTS            (257)   ///< WaveArts
00493 #define AKCOMPANYID_PHONETICARTS        (258)   ///< Phonetic Arts
00494 #define AKCOMPANYID_IZOTOPE             (259)   ///< iZotope
00495 #define AKCOMPANYID_GENAUDIO            (260)   ///< GenAudio
00496 #define AKCOMPANYID_CRANKCASEAUDIO      (261)   ///< Crankcase Audio
00497 #define AKCOMPANYID_IOSONO              (262)   ///< IOSONO
00498 #define AKCOMPANYID_AUROTECHNOLOGIES    (263)   ///< Auro Technologies
00499 #define AKCOMPANYID_DOLBY               (264)   ///< Dolby
00500 
00501 // File/encoding types of Audiokinetic.
00502 #define AKCODECID_BANK                  (0)     ///< Bank encoding
00503 #define AKCODECID_PCM                   (1)     ///< PCM encoding
00504 #define AKCODECID_ADPCM                 (2)     ///< ADPCM encoding
00505 #define AKCODECID_XMA                   (3)     ///< XMA encoding
00506 #define AKCODECID_VORBIS                (4)     ///< Vorbis encoding
00507 #define AKCODECID_WIIADPCM              (5)     ///< ADPCM encoding on the Wii
00508 #define AKCODECID_PCMEX                 (7)     ///< Standard PCM WAV file parser for Wwise Authoring
00509 #define AKCODECID_EXTERNAL_SOURCE       (8)     ///< External Source (unknown encoding)
00510 #define AKCODECID_XWMA                  (9)     ///< xWMA encoding
00511 #define AKCODECID_AAC                   (10)    ///< AAC encoding (only available on Apple devices) -- see AkAACFactory.h
00512 #define AKCODECID_FILE_PACKAGE          (11)    ///< File package files generated by the File Packager utility.
00513 #define AKCODECID_ATRAC9                (12)    ///< ATRAC-9 encoding
00514 #define AKCODECID_VAG                   (13)    ///< VAG/HE-VAG encoding
00515 #define AKCODECID_PROFILERCAPTURE       (14)    ///< Profiler capture file (.prof) as written through AK::SoundEngine::StartProfilerCapture
00516 #define AKCODECID_ANALYSISFILE          (15)    ///< Analysis file
00517 #define AKCODECID_MIDI                  (16)    ///< MIDI file
00518 
00519 //The following are internally defined
00520 #define AK_WAVE_FORMAT_VAG              0xFFFB
00521 #define AK_WAVE_FORMAT_AT9              0xFFFC
00522 #define AK_WAVE_FORMAT_VORBIS           0xFFFF
00523 #define AK_WAVE_FORMAT_AAC              0xAAC0

00602 
00603 struct WwiseObjectIDext
00604 {
00605 public:
00606 
00607     bool operator == ( const WwiseObjectIDext& in_rOther ) const
00608     {
00609         return in_rOther.id == id && in_rOther.bIsBus == bIsBus;
00610     }
00611 
00612     AkNodeType GetType()
00613     {
00614         return bIsBus ? AkNodeType_Bus : AkNodeType_Default;
00615     }
00616 
00617     AkUniqueID  id;
00618     bool        bIsBus;
00619 };
00620 
00621 struct WwiseObjectID : public WwiseObjectIDext
00622 {
00623     WwiseObjectID()
00624     {
00625         id = AK_INVALID_UNIQUE_ID;
00626         bIsBus = false;
00627     }
00628 
00629     WwiseObjectID( AkUniqueID in_ID )
00630     {
00631         id = in_ID;
00632         bIsBus = false;
00633     }
00634 
00635     WwiseObjectID( AkUniqueID in_ID, bool in_bIsBus )
00636     {
00637         id = in_ID;
00638         bIsBus = in_bIsBus;
00639     }
00640 
00641     WwiseObjectID( AkUniqueID in_ID, AkNodeType in_eNodeType )
00642     {
00643         id = in_ID;
00644         bIsBus = in_eNodeType == AkNodeType_Bus;
00645     }
00646 };

00679 #if defined(AK_CPU_X86_64) || defined(AK_CPU_ARM_64)
00680     #define AK_POINTER_64
00681 #endif // #if defined(AK_CPU_X86_64) || defined(AK_CPU_ARM_64)
00682 
00683 #if !defined(AkRegister)
00684     #define AkRegister register
00685 #endif
00686 
00687 #endif  //_AK_DATA_TYPES_H_
